entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
